modules.description: This module manages fontmaps for rendering text with Cairo and Pango, providing functions to create, configure, and retrieve fontmaps, including setting and getting the resolution and font backend type. It works with `Pango.font_map` objects and integrates with Cairo font types to control text rendering quality and behavior. Concrete use cases include setting a custom fontmap with a specific resolution for high-quality text rendering or switching Cairo font backends per thread.

This module integrates Pango text layout with Cairo rendering, enabling precise text rendering, measurement, and path creation. It operates on Cairo contexts and Pango layouts, supporting operations like setting font resolution, rendering text layouts, and drawing error underlines. Concrete use cases include rendering formatted text in GUI applications, measuring text dimensions for layout purposes, and drawing custom underlines for text editing feedback.
